refnamediv.refpurpose: Returns the type of the column corresponding to the given field offset

refentry.refsect1:
&reftitle.parameters;
result
Array type of the fetched result CUBRID_NUM, CUBRID_ASSOC, CUBRID_BOTH.
field_offset
The numerical field offset. The field_offset starts at 0. If field_offset does not exist, an error of level E_WARNING is also issued.

&reftitle.returnvalues;
Type of the column, on success.
&false; when invalid field_offset value.
-1 if SQL sentence is not SELECT.
